it.polimi.group03.domain

Class Bead

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.group03.domain.Bead

  • public class Bead
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a bead in the matrix (board), when a bead is added to a player, its status is set to active by default. A bead cannot be moved from one position to another, in the eventual case a player loses his beads these will be set as inactive.
    Since:
    11/11/2015.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    cecibloom, megireci, tatibloom
    See Also:
    Position
